p: Projections show that under future climate, atmospheric carbon dioxide, and BAU management, an increase in net carbon uptake due to CO 2 fertilization and climate in the mesic ecoregions far outweighs losses from fire and drought in the semiarid ecoregions. There was not an increasing trend in fire. Carbon stocks increased by 2% and 7% and NEP increased by 12% and 40% by 2050 and 2100, respectively.
